item.title: Saml Authentication
item.description: What is SAML Security Assertion Markup Language ( XML based but Base64 encoded). Standard protocol for web Single Sign-On (SSO) & Federated identity. Allow apps and services to offload “authentication” to a trusted 3rd party. SSO intended to be easy for the user and transparent after the user has logged in the first time. item.title: Fortinet Guest Wifi with Captive Portal
